parameters.prompt: Precision Engineering Visualization: Render based on technical vector geometry. Intent: Bio-parametric office structure, white walls, green roof. Strict structural lock on wall intersections and window apertures. Zero drift from 2D coordinates. Aesthetic: Clean architectural photography, hyper-realistic materials, neutral lighting. Camera: 24mm Wide Angle, Eye-level (1.6m).
parameters.negative_prompt: hallucination, distorted walls, extra windows, blurry textures, altered perspective, floor collapse, missing levels
